title: Cosmetology - Careers Subject Guide - LibGuides at Everett Community College
description: A guide for exploring career options. career resources for cosmetology students
content: Career Sites Barbers, Hairstylists, and Cosmetologists From the Occupational Outlook Handbook, includes job outlook and salary information. Cosmetology and Beauty Careers Links to descriptions of dozens of cosmetology specialties. Hairdresser Career profile from U.S.News & World Report, includes advice from people in the field. Hairstylist and Salon Owner Brief videos about aspects of the career. Ten Outside-the-Box Jobs You Can Pursue With a Cosmetology License Illustrated guide. WA State Licensing (DOL): Cosmetologists Information on getting or renewing a cosmetology license in Washington state. What Does a Cosmetologist Do? From Indeed.com, a guide to duties and skills. Why is Cosmetology a Good Career Choice? Video More Career Information Check out this LibGuide for more job search advice. Careers Subject Guide 253 views this year Career Books Unless otherwise noted, all books are in the Career Collection and can be checked out for 22 days. Careers in Focus: Cosmetology by Ferguson Publishing Staff Call Number: TT958 .C367 2008 ISBN: 081607271X Cosmetology Certification Exam by LearningExpress Staff Call Number: TT958 .C67 2006 ISBN: 1576855643 Guide to Good Hairdressing : a fun, quick, informative guide to choosing and exploring your career potential in the hairdressing industry by Julie Handley Call Number: TT958 .H36 2004 ISBN: 1857565444 Opportunities in Beauty and Modeling Careers by Susan Wood Gearhart Call Number: HF5382.O62 B3841 2005 ISBN: 0071437266 Preparing for the Practical Exam by Deborah Beatty Call Number: TT958 .B42 2003 ISBN: 1401815324 Standard Cosmetology 2008 by Catherine M. Frangie; Milady Publishing Company Staff Call Number: TT958 .F73 2008 ISBN: 1418049433 Successful Salon Management by Edward J. Tezak Call Number: TT965 .T493 2002 ISBN: 1562536796 Located in Main Book Collection. << Previous: Computer Science Next: Criminal Justice >>

For personalized research help, visit the library on the 3rd floor of the Cascade Learning Resource Center, email library@everettcc.edu or call 425-388-9354 . Home - Financial Aid and Scholarships - LibGuides at Everett Community College
children.description: Find local, state and national sources of financial aid for college students
children.content: EvCC Financial Aid Resources This guide will help you discover information about financial aid and scholarships at Everett Community College. Financial Aid Office Federal Code : 003776 (425) 388-9280 voice (425) 388-9185 fax fin_aid@everettcc.edu Scholarships Veterans' Resource Center Workforce Funding Ask an EvCC Librarian Research Assistance EvCC Librarians can help you locate resources in print and online, narrow down your topic, and cite your sources. In Person: Cascade LRC, 3rd floor Email: library@everettcc.edu Phone: 425-388-9354 Understanding Financial Aid 12th Year Campaign Events Free virtual events that focus on applying for college and financial aid. Tailored to students in Washington state. ED.gov Guidelines on paying for college and understanding financial aid. FinAid.org Guides students through the financial aid process, explains different categories of student loans, explores other types of aid, and provides needs calculators. Note: Citibank is a co-sponsor for this site Junior/Senior Workbook PDF step-by-step guide for Washington state high school juniors and seniors on preparing for college. Includes information about financial aid. National Association of Student Financial Aid Administrators Answers to common questions plus tips for applying for aid for students and parents. Federal Student Aid Federal Student Aid provides publications, fact sheets, online tools, and other resources to help you prepare and pay for college or career school. Washington Financial Aid Association (FAQs) Frequently Asked Questions - answers from the Washington Financial Aid Association Washington State Student Loan Education Site Modules on topics related to student loans from the Washington Student Achievement Council. Washington Student Achievement Council Overview of financial aid and specific programs for students in Washington. Financial Aid Finder Financial aid in the news: Loading ... Next: FAFSA & WASFA >>
